headline: Why The Narrative Around Leidos Is Shifting After Recent Analyst Upgrades and New Guidance
summary: Leidos Holdings has seen its consensus analyst price target rise from $201.83 to $218.08 per share, marking a notable reassessment of expectations among the investment community. This shift reflects analysts’ recognition of the company’s sustained margin strength, a robust $69 billion contract pipeline, and strong execution in strategic areas, even with some ongoing market uncertainties. As the narrative around Leidos evolves, stay tuned for insights on how to track these developments and...
